scripts.clean: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const {execSync}=require('child_process'); if(fs.existsSync('node_modules')) execSync(process.platform==='win32' ? 'rmdir /s /q node_modules' : 'rm -rf node_modules'); if(fs.existsSync('package-lock.json')) fs.unlinkSync('package-lock.json'); console.log('âœ… Clean complete');"
